feed.title: The Adventures of Mimi and Momo
feed.subtitle: Where are we?

entry.title: November 18, 2016
entry.content:
Day Four. Volkswagen Jetta.
From our conversations, I deduced that you enjoy cafes and coffee. Personally at the time, I enjoyed cafe aesthetic and vibes. Coffee not so much…. I wanted to “impress” you. Cafe Cristal was on my list. I got a ZipCar and picked you up at school. I honestly can’t believe you got into that Blue Volkswagen Jetta. We headed to Cafe Cristal, and to be honest the only thing I remember from it was not the coffee. We said we might come back and try the high tea, but the highlight was me trying to eat a waffle which had powdered sugar. All that sugar ended up on my new pair of Black pants.


Did some girl I just met and barely know, willingly got into a car with me and headed into the middle of nowhere?

entry.title: November 15, 2016
entry.content:
Day Two. Ramen.
I was working at the Canadian Museum of Nature. It was a decent shift. As I got off work, I once again jokingly asked you on Snapchat if you wanted to go eat. I met you, along with Daphne, at MRT. We then headed to Ginza Ramen on Elgin. Thus Ramen date was coined.


I met you and Daphne. Little did I know the impact you’d both have on me.

entry.title: November 14, 2016
entry.content:
Day one. First Contact.
This was the day where everything began. I was at MRT with Daphne just chilling and studying. Through her we started Snapchatting each other. I jokingly asked you to come visit before you went to eat in the caf.


Out of the blue, you showed up and plopped down next to Daphne. I couldn’t even look at you straight.
